com.mapdigit.gis

Class DigitalMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayer
      • com.mapdigit.gis.MapLayerContainer
        • com.mapdigit.gis.DigitalMap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RasterMap

    public abstract class DigitalMap
extends MapLayerContainer
    DigitalMap is the base class for VectorMap and RasterMap. It's an abstract class provides all common functions for digtial maps.

    © Copyright 2010 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
